value.title: When will Dark mode be available in Power BI?
value.excerpt: How do I activate Dark mode in Power BI? Short answer, you cant, but it is in the power bi roadmap (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UFvQ661kK6M). In this video we will talk about when dark mode is planned, issues when embedding power bi reports where dark mode is available and also discuss some additional

value.title: Working hours without Holidays, weekends and by country in power query
value.excerpt: In today's video we are going to write a function that calculates work hour (seconds) between two datetimes. Working hour by location, holidays will also be included :)  Link to Bills thread: https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/f3fc729e-a2ec-409a-b20e-b5cf8ff5dc2a/calculate-work-hours-between-two-timedate-stamps?forum=powerquery

value.title: Copy Conditional Columns in Power Query or Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how to use conditional columns within Power Query and then copying them for use in other queries or Power BI Desktop files.
